resources.string: Shaukat Khanum Memorial Cancer Hospital and Research Centre (SKMCH RC) is a state-of-the-art cancer centre located in Lahore, Pakistan. It is a project of the Shaukat Khanum Memorial Trust, which is a charitable organization established under the Societies Registration Act XXI of 1860 of Pakistan. “To act as a model institution to alleviate the suffering of patients with cancer through the application of modern methods of curative and palliative therapy irrespective of their ability to pay, the education of health care professionals and the public and perform research into the causes and treatment of cancer.”

To ensure that the person in need for blood does not have to go through the panic they face while looking and searching out for blood.As the donor will personally meet and donate blood to the needy person, the donow will have satisfaction as he/she is sure that blood is being donated not being sold by any other blood donating society.

Our main mission is to help donors to donate multilple NGOs using a single system. Most of the NGOs in our country have not access to online donation. Our system will help those NGOs to raise their donations through online donation. Moreover, our system will help needy people to raise funds using Crowdfunding feature.
